title: Thailand Adventure
intro: A tropical escape to the beaches of Phuket and the bustling city life of Bangkok.

items.title: Patong Beach
items.description: Checked into the hotel near Patong Beach on October 1st.

items.title: Bangla Walking Street
items.description: Explored the vibrant nightlife and street food of Bangla Walking Street.

items.title: Island Tour
items.description: Took a boat tour to explore the stunning nearby islands.

items.title: Big Buddha
items.description: Visited the majestic Big Buddha temple atop Nakkerd Hills.

items.title: Trick Eye Museum
items.description: Visited the interactive 3D art museum for some fun photo opportunities.

items.title: Zoo Experience
items.description: Visited the zoo and had the unique experience of holding a tiger.

items.title: Mahanakhon Skywalk
items.description: Walked on the glass tray at the top of King Power Mahanakhon for thrilling city views.

items.title: Madame Tussauds
items.description: Rubbed shoulders with wax figures of celebrities and historical icons.
